description: Number of reversible strings with n-1 beads of 2 colors. 6 beads are black. Strings is not palindromic.
formula: "BHK[ 7 ]" (reversible, identity, unlabeled, 7 parts) transform of 1, 1, 1, 1...Empirical G.f.: -x^8*(x^2+3)/((x-1)^7*(x+1)^3). [_Colin Barker_, Nov 24 2012]
author: _Christian G. Bower_
